Posts.Content: Yes, my dad went there for his tumor 6 years ago.  All the other hospitals turned him away but Sloan Kettering attempted treatment.  Unfortantely, it didn't work but my mom had great things to say about them.  Thanks for responding!
Posts.Title: What hospital is the best equipped to treat breast cancer?

Posts.Content: My soon to be mother-in-law was diagnosed with breast cancer today and is scheduled to have a masectomy on Thursday.  We are encouraging her to get a second opinion because we don't know if this hospital is up to speed on breast cancer treatments.  Any suggestions on good doctors and hospitals she could go to???
Posts.Title: What hospital is the best equipped to treat breast cancer?
